verses.verse: אָדָ֥ם <WH121> 'a-Dam Adam שֵׁ֖ת <WH8352> shet Sheth אֱנֽוֹשׁ׃ <WH583> e-Noosh. Enosh
קֵינָ֥ן <WH7018> kei-Nan Kenan מַהֲלַלְאֵ֖ל <WH4111> ma-ha-lal-'El Mahalaleel יָֽרֶד׃ <WH3382> Ya-red. Jered
חֲנ֥וֹךְ <WH2585> cha-Noch Henoch מְתוּשֶׁ֖לַח <WH4968> me-tu-She-lach Methuselah לָֽמֶךְ׃ <WH3929> La-mech. Lamech
נֹ֥חַ <WH5146> No-ach Noah שֵׁ֖ם <WH8035> shem Shem חָ֥ם <WH2526> cham Ham וָיָֽפֶת׃ <WH3315> va-Ya-fet. and Japheth ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The sons יֶ֔פֶת <WH3315> Ye-fet, of Japheth גֹּ֣מֶר <WH1586> Go-mer Gomer וּמָג֔וֹג <WH4031> u-ma-Gog, and Magog וּמָדַ֖י <WH4074> u-ma-Dai and Madai וְיָוָ֣ן <WH3120> ve-ya-Van and Javan וְתֻבָ֑ל <WH8422> ve-tu-Val; and Tubal וּמֶ֖שֶׁךְ <WH4902> u-Me-shech and Meshech וְתִירָֽס׃ <WH8494> ve-ti-Ras. and Tiras ס sa-Mek

וּבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons גֹּ֑מֶר <WH1586> Go-mer; of Gomer אַשְׁכֲּנַ֥ז <WH813> 'ash-ka-Naz Ashchenaz וְדִיפַ֖ת <WH7384> ve-di-Fat and Riphath וְתוֹגַרְמָֽה׃ <WH8425> ve-to-gar-Mah. and Togarmah

וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons יָוָ֖ן <WH3120> ya-Van of Javan אֱלִישָׁ֣ה <WH473> 'e-li-Shah Elishah וְתַרְשִׁ֑ישָׁה <WH8659> ve-tar-Shi-shah; and Tarshish כִּתִּ֖ים <WH3794> kit-Tim Kittim וְרוֹדָנִֽים׃ <WH1721> ve-ro-da-Nim. and Dodanim ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> be-Nei The sons חָ֑ם <WH2526> Cham; of Ham כּ֥וּשׁ <WH3568> kush Cush וּמִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> u-mitz-Ra-yim and Mizraim פּ֥וּט <WH6316> put Put וּכְנָֽעַן׃ <WH3667> u-che-Na-'an. and Canaan

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons כ֔וּשׁ <WH3568> Chush, of Cush סְבָא֙ <WH5434> se-Va Seba וַחֲוִילָ֔ה <WH2341> va-cha-vi-Lah, and Havilah וְסַבְתָּ֥א <WH5454> ve-sav-Ta and Sabta וְרַעְמָ֖א <WH7484> ve-ra'-Ma and Raamah וְסַבְתְּכָ֑א <WH5455> ve-sav-te-Cha; and Sabtecha וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons רַעְמָ֖א <WH7484> ra'-Ma of Raamah שְׁבָ֥א <WH7614> she-Va Sheba וּדְדָֽן׃ <WH1719> u-de-Dan. and Dedan ס sa-Mek

וְכ֖וּשׁ <WH3568> ve-Chush And Cush יָלַ֣ד <WH3205> ya-Lad begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- נִמְר֑וֹד <WH5248> nim-Rod; Nimrod ה֣וּא <WH1931> hu he הֵחֵ֔ל <WH2490> he-Chel, he began לִהְי֥וֹת <WH1961> lih-Yot to be a גִּבּ֖וֹר <WH1368> gib-Bor to be mighty בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ba-'A-retz. upon the earth ס sa-Mek

וּמִצְרַ֡יִם <WH4714> u-mitz-Ra-yim And Mizraim יָלַ֞ד <WH3205> ya-Lad begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- ; לוּדִיִּים lu-di-yim כלוּדִ֧ים <WH3866> lu-Dim Ludim קוְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et עֲנָמִ֛ים <WH6047> 'a-na-Mim and Anamim וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et לְהָבִ֖ים <WH3853> le-ha-Vim and Lehabim וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et נַפְתֻּחִֽים׃ <WH5320> naf-tu-Chim. and Naphtuhim

וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et פַּתְרֻסִ֞ים <WH6625> pat-ru-Sim And Pathrusim וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et כַּסְלֻחִ֗ים <WH3695> kas-lu-Chim, and Casluhim אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which יָצְא֥וּ <WH3318> ya-tze-'U (of whom came מִשָּׁ֛ם <WH8033> mish-Sham in it פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> pe-lish-Tim the Philistines וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et כַּפְתֹּרִֽים׃ <WH3732> kaf-to-Rim. and Caphtor ס sa-Mek

וּכְנַ֗עַן <WH3667> u-che-Na-'an, And Canaan יָלַ֛ד <WH3205> ya-Lad begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- צִיד֥וֹן <WH6721> tzi-Don Zidon בְּכֹר֖וֹ <WH1060> be-cho-Ro his firstborn וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et חֵֽת׃ <WH2845> Chet. and Heth

וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַיְבוּסִי֙ <WH2983> hay-vu-Si The Jebusite וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הָ֣אֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> ha-'e-mo-Ri, also and the Amorite וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> ve-'Et הַגִּרְגָּשִֽׁי׃ <WH1622> hag-gir-ga-Shi. and the Girgashite

וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַחִוִּ֥י <WH2340> ha-chiv-Vi And the Hivite וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַֽעַרְקִ֖י <WH6208> ha-'ar-Ki and the Arkite וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַסִּינִֽי׃ <WH5513> has-si-Ni. and the Sinite

וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הָאַרְוָדִ֥י <WH721> ha-'ar-va-Di And the Arvadite וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַצְּמָרִ֖י <WH6786> hatz-tze-ma-Ri and the Zemarite וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַֽחֲמָתִֽי׃ <WH2577> Ha-cha-ma-Ti. and the Hamathite ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The sons שֵׁ֔ם <WH8035> Shem, of Shem עֵילָ֣ם <WH5867> 'ei-Lam Elam וְאַשּׁ֔וּר <WH804> ve-'ash-Shur, and Asshur וְאַרְפַּכְשַׁ֖ד <WH775> ve-'ar-pach-Shad and Arphaxad וְל֣וּד <WH3865> ve-Lud and Lud וַאֲרָ֑ם <WH758> va-'a-Ram; and Aram וְע֥וּץ <WH5780> ve-'Utz and Uz וְח֖וּל <WH2343> ve-Chul and Hul וְגֶ֥תֶר <WH1666> ve-Ge-ter and Gether וָמֶֽשֶׁךְ׃ <WH4902> va-Me-shech. and Meshech ס sa-Mek

וְאַרְפַּכְשַׁ֖ד <WH775> ve-'ar-pach-Shad And Arphaxad יָלַ֣ד <WH3205> ya-Lad begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שָׁ֑לַח <WH7974> Sha-lach; Shelah וְשֶׁ֖לַח <WH7974> ve-She-lach and Shelah יָלַ֥ד <WH3205> ya-Lad begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עֵֽבֶר׃ <WH5677> 'E-ver. Eber

וּלְעֵ֥בֶר <WH5677> u-le-'E-ver And unto Eber יֻלַּ֖ד <WH3205> yul-Lad were born שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> she-Nei two בָנִ֑ים <WH1121> va-Nim; sons שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> shem the name הָאֶחָ֞ד <WH259> ha-'e-Chad of the one פֶּ֗לֶג <WH6389> Pe-leg, [was] Peleg כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki in בְיָמָיו֙ <WH3117> ve-ya-Mav because in his days נִפְלְגָ֣ה <WH6385> nif-le-Gah was divided הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, the earth וְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> ve-Shem name אָחִ֖יו <WH251> 'a-Chiv and his brother's יָקְטָֽן׃ <WH3355> ya-ke-Tan. [was] Joktan

וְיָקְטָ֣ן <WH3355> ve-ya-ke-Tan And Joktan יָלַ֔ד <WH3205> ya-Lad, begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אַלְמוֹדָ֖ד <WH486> al-mo-Dad Almodad וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et שָׁ֑לֶף <WH8026> Sha-lef; and Sheleph וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et חֲצַרְמָ֖וֶת <WH2700> cha-tzar-Ma-vet and Hazarmaveth וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et יָֽרַח׃ <WH3392> Ya-rach. and Jerah
וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הֲדוֹרָ֥ם <WH1913> ha-do-Ram Hadoram וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et אוּזָ֖ל <WH187> 'u-Zal also and Uzal וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et דִּקְלָֽה׃ <WH1853> dik-Lah. and Diklah
וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et עֵיבָ֥ל <WH5858> 'ei-Val And Ebal וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et אֲבִימָאֵ֖ל <WH39> 'a-vi-ma-'El and Abimael וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et שְׁבָֽא׃ <WH7614> she-Va. and Sheba

וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et אוֹפִ֥יר <WH211> o-Fir And Ophir וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et חֲוִילָ֖ה <WH2341> cha-vi-Lah and Havilah וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et יוֹבָ֑ב <WH3103> yo-Vav; and Jobab כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh these בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei All these [were] the sons יָקְטָֽן׃ <WH3355> ya-ke-Tan. of Joktan ס sa-Mek
שֵׁ֥ם׀ <WH8035> shem Shem אַרְפַּכְשַׁ֖ד <WH775> 'ar-pach-Shad Arphaxad שָֽׁלַח׃ <WH7974> Sha-lach. Shelah
עֵ֥בֶר <WH5677> 'E-ver Eber פֶּ֖לֶג <WH6389> Pe-leg Peleg רְעֽוּ׃ <WH7466> re-'U. Reu
שְׂר֥וּג <WH8286> se-Rug Serug נָח֖וֹר <WH5152> na-Chor Nahor תָּֽרַח׃ <WH8646> Ta-rach. Terah
אַבְרָ֖ם <WH87> 'av-Ram Abram ה֥וּא <WH1931> hu that אַבְרָהָֽם׃ <WH85> 'av-ra-Ham. the same [is] Abraham ס sa-Mek
בְּנֵי֙ <WH1121> be-Nei The sons אַבְרָהָ֔ם <WH85> 'av-ra-Ham, of Abraham יִצְחָ֖ק <WH3327> yitz-Chak Isaac וְיִשְׁמָעֵֽאל׃ <WH3458> ve-yish-ma-'El. and Ishmael ס sa-Mek

אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These תֹּלְדוֹתָ֑ם <WH8435> to-le-do-Tam; These [are] their generations בְּכ֤וֹר <WH1060> be-Chor The firstborn יִשְׁמָעֵאל֙ <WH3458> yish-ma-'eL of Ishmael נְבָי֔וֹת <WH5032> ne-va-Yot, Nebaioth וְקֵדָ֥ר <WH6938> ve-ke-Dar then Kedar וְאַדְבְּאֵ֖ל <WH110> ve-'ad-be-'El and Adbeel וּמִבְשָֽׂם׃ <WH4017> u-miv-Sam. and Mibsam
מִשְׁמָ֣ע <WH4927> mish-Ma' Mishma וְדוּמָ֔ה <WH1746> ve-du-Mah, and Dumah מַשָּׂ֖א <WH4854> mas-Sa Massa חֲדַ֥ד <WH2301> cha-Dad Hadad וְתֵימָֽא׃ <WH8485> ve-tei-Ma. and Tema

יְט֥וּר <WH3195> ye-Tur Jetur נָפִ֖ישׁ <WH5305> na-Fish Naphish וָקֵ֑דְמָה <WH6929> va-Ke-de-mah; and Kedemah אֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh these הֵ֖ם <WH1992> hem like בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei These are the sons יִשְׁמָעֵֽאל׃ <WH3458> yish-ma-'El. of Ishmael ס sa-Mek

וּבְנֵ֨י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei Now the sons קְטוּרָ֜ה <WH6989> ke-tu-Rah of Keturah פִּילֶ֣גֶשׁ <WH6370> pi-Le-gesh concubine אַבְרָהָ֗ם <WH85> 'av-ra-Ham, Abraham's יָלְדָ֞ה <WH3205> Yal-dah she bare אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- זִמְרָ֧ן <WH2175> zim-Ran Zimran וְיָקְשָׁ֛ן <WH3370> ve-ya-ke-Shan and Jokshan וּמְדָ֥ן <WH4091> u-me-Dan and Medan וּמִדְיָ֖ן <WH4080> u-mid-Yan and Midian וְיִשְׁבָּ֣ק <WH3435> ve-yish-Bak and Ishbak וְשׁ֑וּחַ <WH7744> ve-Shu-ach; and Shuah וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons יָקְשָׁ֖ן <WH3370> ya-ke-Shan of Jokshan שְׁבָ֥א <WH7614> she-Va Sheba וּדְדָֽן׃ <WH1719> u-de-Dan. and Dedan ס sa-Mek

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons מִדְיָ֗ן <WH4080> mid-Yan, of Midian עֵיפָ֤ה <WH5891> 'ei-Fah Ephah וָעֵ֙פֶר֙ <WH6081> va-'E-fer and Epher וַחֲנ֔וֹךְ <WH2585> va-cha-Noch, and Henoch וַאֲבִידָ֖ע <WH28> va-'a-vi-Da' and Abida וְאֶלְדָּעָ֑ה <WH420> ve-'el-da-'Ah; and Eldaah כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh these בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei All these [are] the sons קְטוּרָֽה׃ <WH6989> ke-tu-Rah. of Keturah ס sa-Mek

וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <WH3205> vai-Yo-led begat אַבְרָהָ֖ם <WH85> 'av-ra-Ham And Abraham אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יִצְחָ֑ק <WH3327> yitz-Chak; Isaac ס sa-Mek בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The sons יִצְחָ֔ק <WH3327> yitz-Chak, of Isaac עֵשָׂ֖ו <WH6215> 'e-Sav Esau וְיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> ve-Yis-ra-'El. and Israel ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> be-Nei The sons עֵשָׂ֑ו <WH6215> 'e-Sav; of Esau אֱלִיפַ֛ז <WH464> 'e-li-Faz Eliphaz רְעוּאֵ֥ל <WH7467> re-'u-'El Reuel וִיע֖וּשׁ <WH3266> vi-'Ush and Jeush וְיַעְלָ֥ם <WH3281> ve-ya'-Lam and Jaalam וְקֹֽרַח׃ <WH7141> ve-Ko-rach. and Korah ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> be-Nei The sons אֱלִיפָ֑ז <WH464> 'e-li-Faz; of Eliphaz תֵּימָ֤ן <WH8487> tei-Man Teman וְאוֹמָר֙ <WH201> ve-'o-Mar and Omar צְפִ֣י <WH6825> tze-Fi Zephi וְגַעְתָּ֔ם <WH1609> ve-ga'-Tam, and Gatam קְנַ֖ז <WH7073> ke-Naz Kenaz וְתִמְנָ֥ע <WH8555> ve-tim-Na' and Timna וַעֲמָלֵֽק׃ <WH6002> va-'a-ma-Lek. and Amalek ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> be-Nei The sons רְעוּאֵ֑ל <WH7467> re-'u-'El; of Reuel נַ֥חַת <WH5184> Na-chat Nahath זֶ֖רַח <WH2226> Ze-rach Zerah שַׁמָּ֥ה <WH8048> sham-Mah Shammah וּמִזָּֽה׃ <WH4199> u-miz-Zah. and Mizzah ס sa-Mek

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons שֵׂעִ֔יר <WH8165> se-'Ir, of Seir לוֹטָ֥ן <WH3877> lo-Tan Lotan וְשׁוֹבָ֖ל <WH7732> ve-sho-Val and Shobal וְצִבְע֣וֹן <WH6649> ve-tziv-'on and Zibeon וַֽעֲנָ֑ה <WH6034> va-'a-Nah; and Anah וְדִישֹׁ֥ן <WH1787> ve-di-Shon and Dishon וְאֵ֖צֶר <WH687> ve-'E-tzer and Ezer וְדִישָֽׁן׃ <WH1789> ve-di-Shan. and Dishan

וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons לוֹטָ֖ן <WH3877> lo-Tan of Lotan חֹרִ֣י <WH2753> cho-Ri Hori וְהוֹמָ֑ם <WH1950> ve-ho-Mam; and Homam וַאֲח֥וֹת <WH269> va-'a-Chot sister לוֹטָ֖ן <WH3877> lo-Tan [was] Lotan's תִּמְנָֽע׃ <WH8555> tim-Na'. and Timna ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The sons שׁוֹבָ֔ל <WH7732> sho-Val, of Shobal עַלְיָ֧ן <WH5935> 'al-Yan Alian וּמָנַ֛חַת <WH4506> u-ma-Na-chat and Manahath וְעֵיבָ֖ל <WH5858> ve-'ei-Val and Ebal שְׁפִ֣י <WH8195> she-Fi Shephi וְאוֹנָ֑ם <WH208> ve-'o-Nam; and Onam ס sa-Mek וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons צִבְע֖וֹן <WH6649> tziv-'on of Zibeon אַיָּ֥ה <WH345> 'ai-Yah Aiah וַעֲנָֽה׃ <WH6034> va-'a-Nah. and Anah

בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei The sons עֲנָ֖ה <WH6034> 'a-Nah of Anah דִּישׁ֑וֹן <WH1787> di-Shon; Dishon ס sa-Mek וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons דִישׁ֔וֹן <WH1787> di-Shon, of Dishon חַמְרָ֥ן <WH2566> cham-Ran Amram וְאֶשְׁבָּ֖ן <WH790> ve-'esh-Ban and Eshban וְיִתְרָ֥ן <WH3506> ve-yit-Ran and Ithran וּכְרָֽן׃ <WH3763> u-che-Ran. and Cheran ס sa-Mek

בְּֽנֵי־ <WH1121> be-nei- The sons אֵ֔צֶר <WH687> 'E-tzer, of Ezer בִּלְהָ֥ן <WH1092> bil-Han Bilhan וְזַעֲוָ֖ן <WH2190> ve-za-'a-Van and Zavan יַעֲקָ֑ן <WH3292> ya-'a-Kan; [and] Jakan בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei The sons דִישׁ֖וֹן <WH1787> di-Shon Dishon ע֥וּץ <WH5780> 'utz Uz וַאֲרָֽן׃ <WH765> va-'a-Ran. and Aran פ Peh
